thread.title: BRIEF-United Ratings Raises Tianjin Zhonghuan Semiconductor's Long-Term Credit Rating To AA+

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-United Ratings Raises Tianjin Zhonghuan Semiconductor's Long-Term Credit Rating To AA+

organizations.name: brief-united ratings raises tianjin zhonghuan semiconductor
reuters) - tianjin zhonghuan semiconductor co ltd

text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Tianjin Zhonghuan Semiconductor Co Ltd :
* SAYS UNITED RATINGS HAS RAISED ITS LONG-TERM CREDIT RATING TO AA+ FROM AA, OUTLOOK STABLE Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2CFxZWu Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
